snippet: More than three decades ago, my mother, grandmother and I boarded a train in Bucharest. I was 5, and I had been told we were going on a holiday to Paris.
abstract: Rukmini Callimachi Reporter's Notebook recalls escaping communist Romania as child, traveling to Germany by way of Hungary; sees parallels with journey of thousands of refugees currently fleeing violence in Syria.
lead_paragraph: More than three decades ago, my mother, grandmother and I boarded a train in Bucharest. I was 5, and I had been told we were going on a holiday to Paris.
